mapper.update: UPDATE mini_market_qna_board_company SET qna_board_company_title = #{qnaBoardCompanyTitle}, qna_board_company_content = #{qnaBoardCompanyContent}, qna_board_company_date = now() WHERE qna_board_company_no = #{qnaBoardCompanyNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mini_market_qna_board_company( company_unique_no, qna_board_company_title, qna_board_company_content, qna_board_company_date ) VALUES ( #{companyUniqueNo}, #{qnaBoardCompanyTitle}, #{qnaBoardCompanyContent}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT q.qna_board_company_no as qnaBoardCompanyNo, c.company_id as companyId, q.qna_board_company_title as qnaBoardCompanyTitle, q.qna_board_company_content as qnaBoardCompanyContent, q.qna_board_company_date as qnaBoardCompanyDate FROM mini_market_qna_board_company AS q INNER JOIN mini_market_company c ON q.company_unique_no = c.company_unique_no WHERE q.qna_board_company_no = #{qnaBoardCompanyNo}

SELECT q.qna_board_company_no as qnaBoardCompanyNo, c.company_id as companyId, q.qna_board_company_title as qnaBoardCompanyTitle, q.qna_board_company_date as qnaBoardCompanyDate FROM mini_market_qna_board_company AS q INNER JOIN mini_market_company c ON q.company_unique_no = c.company_unique_no ORDER BY q.qna_board_company_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
